name: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer with Whisk, Dough Hooks and Easy Clean Beaters, Powerful 275 Watt Motor, Snap-On Storage Case, Black
short_description: EASY CLEAN BEATERS REDUCE CLOGGING AND PROVIDE GREAT MIXING PERFORMANCE. Their smooth, innovative design glides through ingredients to reduce clogging, saving you time and aggravation every time you mix.
NO MORE LOST BEATERS: The snap-on storage case of the Hamilton Beach mixer holds all the attachments, reducing the chance that they are lost or misplaced.

7 VERSATILE ATTACHMENTS. This 6 speed hand mixer includes 2 Easy Clean beaters, 2 traditional beaters, 2 dough hooks and whisk. The attachments easily eject from the mixer after mixing and are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.

POWERFUL, EFFORTLESS MIXING FOR ALL YOUR RECIPES WITH 275 WATTS OF PEAK POWER. This mixer has the power you need to get the job done quickly, whether you're kneading thick bread dough, mixing brownies or whipping cream.

EASILY HANDLE A WIDE RANGE OF MIXING JOBS: Go from slowly folding ingredients on the first speed up to beating or whipping at top speed. This hand mixer has 6 speeds to cover every mixing task and a QuickBurst function for extra power at any speed.
product_description: The Hamilton Beach® 6 Speed Hand Mixer has Easy Clean beaters that reduce clogging and the hassle of stopping to unclog beaters. Includes storage case, 2 Easy Clean beaters, 2 traditional beaters, 2 dough hooks and whisk.
product_details: Model Name Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer
Best Sellers Rank #1,247 in Kitchen & Dining ( See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining ) #4 in Hand Mixers

name: OVENTE 5-Speed Corded Electric Hand Mixer with Stainless Steel Whisks, Compact Portable Design with Snap-On Storage Case,150W Lightweight Handheld Mixer for Baking & Cooking, White HM151W
short_description: SELF-CONTROL SPEED – Features 5 adjustable speeds, ranging from 1 (Lowest) to 5 (Highest), allowing you to choose the ideal mixing speed for perfectly customizable texture and consistency in any recipe. Perfect for whipping cream, making butter, beating egg whites and batter, or preparing mashed potatoes and other dishes.

MIX & WHIP INGREDIENTS WITH EASE – Equipped with 150 watts of motor power and 2 stainless steel whisk beater attachments, this hand mixer effortlessly mixes and whips ingredients for your favorite recipes. Whether you're incorporating heavy ingredients like nuts into cookie dough or making light, fluffy meringue for a pie, this hand mixer blends ingredients seamlessly with its high-quality whisk beaters.

ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED – The shape of the mixer is crafted for a comfortable grip, making it easy to hold during use. Changing speeds is effortless with a simple touch. After mixing, simply press the beater eject button to safely remove the whisk beaters without getting your hands messy.

HASSLE-FREE CLEANUP & STORAGE – Easily clean the motor body by simply wiping it with a damp cloth, while the whisk beaters are dishwasher safe. The snap-on storage case conveniently holds the included attachments, helping to prevent the beaters from being lost or misplaced. Additionally, you can store the power cord in the case for added convenience.

US-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE LETS YOU BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – OVENTE warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
product_description: What’s a kitchen without a great hand mixer? At OVENTE, superior quality doesn’t have to come with a hefty price tag. The 5-Speed Ultra-Power Hand Mixer HM151 Series delivers exceptional performance at an affordable price, making it the ideal tool for any kitchen. Whether you’re whipping up rich mini cheesecakes with ultra-fluffy whipped cream or making creamy mashed potatoes, the possibilities are endless with this versatile mixer. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip and precise control, making it a pleasure to use. Weighing only 1.8 lbs, it’s lightweight, so mixing never feels like a chore. Powered by a 150-Watt motor, it has the strength to effortlessly blend a wide variety of ingredients. Compact and efficient, it’s perfect for all your everyday mixing needs. Cleanup and storage are a breeze. Simply wash the beaters and snap-on storage case with warm, soapy water. Afterward, neatly store the power cord and chrome beaters in the sleek case, snap the mixer on top, and secure it. Simple and convenient!
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #186 in Kitchen & Dining ( See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining ) #2 in Hand Mixers

name: Lord Eagle Hand Mixer Electric Handheld 400W, 5-Speed Lightweight Kitchen Mixer with Storage Case, 5 Stainless Steel Attachments for Baking Cake Egg Cream Food Beater, Turbo+Eject Button
short_description: 🍰 5 SPEEDS WITH TURBO BOOST – This hand mixer features 5 different speeds. Whether you need slow, medium, or fast speeds, it meets all your mixing needs. It effectively prevents ingredient splashing, while the Turbo Boost allows you to speed up the highest gear instantly.

🍰 400W POWERFUL MOTOR & FAST HEAT DISSIPATION – Features the newest upgraded all-pure copper motor, which differs from the standard copper-clad aluminum motors on the market. Mix dough, eggs, milk, butter, cake, or even cream quickly, efficiently, and easily.

🍰 5 STAINLESS STEEL ACCESSORIES & SNAP-ON STORAGE CASE – Includes 2 × Dough Hooks for whipping dough, 2 × Beaters, and 1 × Whisk for eggs and cream. Our accessories are made of high-quality 304 stainless steel. They are rust-resistant, durable for daily use, and dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Say goodbye to messy drawers and lost beaters.

🍰 SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS, WITH EJECTION BUTTON – The lightweight ergonomic grip is comfortable and convenient to operate. It is an ideal gift for wedding registries, new homes, or baking enthusiasts. NOTE: Please adjust the speed to "0" to eject attachments.
🎁 HIGH-LEVEL CUSTOMER SERVICE – This professional electric hand mixer is ideal for home baking. Note: If any attachment arrives damaged, please contact us for a replacement.

name: VEVOR Commercial Immersion Blender, 750W 20" Heavy Duty Hand Mixer, Variable Speed Kitchen Stick Mixer with 304 Stainless Steel Blade, Multi-Purpose Portable Mixer for Soup, Smoothie, Puree, Baby Food
short_description: Powerful Blending Capabilities: This blender is equipped with a pure copper motor, ensuring safe voltage and long-lasting quality, having undergone 6,000 life tests. With a robust 750W capacity and low noise output, it can handle numerous blending tasks quietly and efficiently. A simple push is all it takes to blend quickly, allowing you to enjoy homemade delicacies with ease. Speed can be adjusted from 8000-20000RPM, with the pure copper motor driving the blades below for ingredient cutting.

Easy to Disassemble and Clean: The detachable design allows easy rotation to assemble or disassemble the handle, blending foot, and other accessories. The industrial immersion blender blade can be placed in a dishwasher for hassle-free cleaning.

One-Button Ease of Blending: Our stick blender features a rubberized comfortable grip, ensuring safe and controlled operation. The lock button design allows for prolonged use. Overheating protection ensures the machine cools down after continuous use—operate for 5 minutes and rest for 2, ensuring safety. Variable speed control provides a liberating blending experience.

Food-Grade Steel Blades: The sharp steel blades double the blending efficiency. Outfitted with food-grade 304 stainless steel blades, this electric stick blender assures safety in use. Quickly chop, grind, and unleash the nutrients of ingredients. Effortlessly craft delicious milkshakes, thick soups, and juices, ready to handle all kinds of ingredients.

User-Friendly Wall-mount Design: An innovative storage solution, specifically designed for wall-mounting. Depending on the setting, choose wall-mounted storage for easy accessibility. Elevated storage ensures better hygiene. It's a practical and convenient gem for any kitchen, making it a must-have for those investing in a Commercial Immersion Blender.

name: Hamilton Beach Electric Hand Mixer, 6 Speeds + Stir Button, 300 Watts of Peak Power for Powerful Mixing, Includes Whisk and Storage Clip, Black (62628)
short_description: 6 SPEEDS & STIR BUTTON: The electric hand mixer has 6 speeds for a wide range of mixing tasks. Push the Stir button for a speed that's 20% slower than first speed to reduce splatter when stirring in dry ingredients or combining liquids.

INCLUDES 3 ATTACHMENTS: This modern, lightweight kitchen hand mixer comes with everything you need to start mixing: 2 traditional beaters and a whisk. After mixing, all 3 attachments go in the dishwasher for easy cleanup.

COMPACT STORAGE WITH REMOVABLE STORAGE CLIP: You can quickly store the 3 attachments on the storage clip, which easily attaches onto the underside of the mixer. Its environmentally friendly, space-saving design has 85% less plastic than a storage box.
POWERFUL MIXING: The 300 watt peak-power motor lets you quickly mix and whip everything from cookie dough and mashed potatoes to fluffy frosting and whipped cream.
MORE STABILITY, LESS TIPPING: If you need to step away from the mixer for a moment to add ingredients, the Bowl Rest feature lets you rest this kitchen hand mixer on the edge of your bowl.
product_description: The Hamilton Beach® 6 Speed Hand Mixer handles a wide variety of mixing tasks. It has a Stir button to reduce messy splatter when stirring in ingredients. The mixer comes with 2 traditional beaters, a whisk and a removable clip for compact storage.
